commit message: cancel tasks upon the ListFragment being destroyed
handle fragment searching more transparently: activities are no longer created, instead fragments are pushed onto the stack

EndlessAdapter no longer has any references to the view.

Instead fragments call view.addOnScrollListener(adapter.getScrollListener()).

This allows us to create an adapter in onCreate() instead of onCreateView() for the ListView, which - in turn - allows us to return to the fragment from a search without reloading everything.
